module: Module-level comment: The timing_strobe_generator implements timing strobes ('ticks' and 'beats'). It uses input signals 'i_clk' (clock) and 'i_rst' (reset) to keep track of time periods through 'r_tick_counter' and 'r_beat_counter'. A 'tick' is defined by 'CLOCKS_PER_TICK' clock cycles and a 'beat' consists of 'TICKS_PER_BEAT' ticks. Outputs 'o_tick_stb' and 'o_beat_stb' signal the end of a 'tick' and 'beat' respectively. Reset functionality allows counters to restart, providing flexible time management.
